### Organization

The *Conceptual Clarity Workshop* is organized by [Dirk Wulff](https://www.mpib-berlin.mpg.de/staff/dirk-wulff) (Max Planck Institute for Human Development) and [Rui Mata](https://psychologie.unibas.ch/de/fakultaet/abteilungen/cognitive-and-decision-sciences-305/) (University of Basel). 

Administrative support provided by [Laura Wiles](https://psychologie.unibas.ch/de/personen/laura-wiles/), Center for Cognitive and Decision Sciences, University of Basel.
